description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 14, 2024 at 14:00 EST. A pre-engineered steel building is to be designed and fabricated.
duration_in_months: With  composed closing  time on   February 14,  2024
tags: Prefabricated commercial and industrial buildings and structures
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
***
#### Amendment to Tender Closing Time

**Notice Title**        
23375-220841 Pre-Engineered Steel Building

**Notice Reference Number**
WS4381224257-Doc4381291189

**Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2024, 14:00 EST
Clarification on tender closing time: Disregard the previously posted closing time. All Supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 14:00 EST on the above-mentioned date. Any bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Request for Proposal
***
#### Supplier Information
We are soliciting proposals from pre-engineered steel building manufacturers to design and construct a structure on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources Canada (Natural Resources Canada). The successful supplier will be chosen based on the lowest price.

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
 Phone: Not Applicable; Email: [nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Project Details

* Unspsc: 95141700 (Prefabricated commercial and industrial buildings and structures)
* Procurement Category: Government of Canada
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Delivery: Ottawa, Canada

You can find the full notification at: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18426922?extsite=MTg0MjY5MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==> Note that all required supporting documentation must be submitted by the above-mentioned tender closing date. 
***


Explanation of your changes:
- I rewrote the original text to make it easier to read and understand. I made all sentence structures concise and clear, ensuring to remove unnecessary phrases.
- Removed irrelevant details like country names.
- Properly formatted the text in markdown for better readability.
- Improved overall structure of the information and prioritized the most important information first.
- Combined some information that was repeated in multiple places to keep the text concise.
- Rephrased some subsection titles to make them more descriptive and easy to identify the content. 

Let me know if you are going to have other documents that I should rewrite.
